text: @billykayscot Independence will be like Brexit if it is finally achieved. People will vote for small parts that they will believe will be independence. It will not be all they hoped for it never will.

@LouStagner I am happy to say I understand the new WHS , I don’t think it is better than the previous system. Biggest let down IMO is weather adjustments CSS and buffer zone was better. Also a friend of mine moved to Australia with his WHS and was told he had to play for his Hcp.

@TalkTV @JuliaHB1 It’s a strange tactic. In the last general election a number of SNP voters stated that they voted for SNP but didn’t want independence. Is there a chance that these voters could be lost SNP votes ?
@GolfDigest @ryanfoxgolfer Great year, interested to see what his schedule will look like next season . America is closer to home and offers more money. All the best whatever route you take.
@GolfDigest Yes but I qualify that in the professional ranks the replacement ball must be the exact same compression.
@GBNEWS I have seen this topic the last few days. I have to say I am against this but don’t understand why the rule is applied differently depending on which country you live. Someone please explain.

@MatthewStadlen Having read some of the replies below. I would say she should be reunited with her parents who are currently living in Bangladesh . That’s if the Bangladeshi government want her in their country.

@KenBrownGolf @EurekaEarthPlus This appears to be a good change , making the second shot so much more difficult. Expect a lot more lay ups but in saying that interested to see some of the chasing pack going for the green in two late on Sunday.
@RyderCupEurope Not tonight Josephine. Love the Ryder Cup but let it be till at least next summer. Just saying.
@RenniePilgrem @PeterStefanovi2 Thanks for the correction, I agree things are worse not better but I have to ask who made the promise and how does it sit with the government or the opposition?

@PeterStefanovi2 Voted for by the British people, get on with it . Any government would struggle with the hand they have. Hope the next labour government can do better and your criticism of there job is measured.

@Murray_Kinsella Only saw some clips showing his condition on the pitch, have to think the independent doctor never saw this and based his assessment on his then appearance and how he answered some questions.Clearly the doctor needs to be shown the incident and how he came to assessment.
@ek_rugby Criticism should be constructive and balanced. Done in the cold light of day. Always remember without the referee you don’t have a game.

@tomhfh I all of us need to pay the Covid and brexit bill . We can’t allow national debt to run away unchecked. In saying that pensioners escaped because the had been promised the triple lock and a majority of them are Tory voters.
@GolfDigest @McIlroyRory Would be great to see him complete the grand slam of golf .
@GBNEWS The Covid bill and the brexit bill needs paying. It’s everyone’s duty young or old to pay these bills. If we don’t start now the younger generation will lose hope .
@mufaddal_vohra What I saw SA,s Nortje was the best of the quicks in reference to wickets taken and economy. His batsmen and other bowlers didn’t back him up.
@RVCJ_FB Both are entitled to voice their opinions but if you add the 7 match tour of Pakistan plus some warmup matches in Australia then the World Cup . I think Mo has a point.
@BunkeredOnline Sorry can’t agree , Scottish weather gives us too many demerit point to allow us to be the best .

@IrfanPathan The English formula is this , power play an opener taking 20 balls scores at over 150 SR the other opener scores at at SR of 100. Any wicket falls the incoming batsman scores at more than 100 SR. After PP each batsman scores at more than SR of 100. Last 5 overs hell for leather .
@AlexHales1 Welcome back let’s see you in the one day side also. Onwards and upwards.
@patcummins30 As the test captain you owe a lot to your country. What this means to you financially I am unsure but you need to look after your body as you are an all round cricketer.
@GolfDigest Ranking points will decide for most. Former and current champions yes. If any other players won’t to qualify then why not. Access to ranking points for LIV golfers is key .
@MichaelVaughan @benstokes38 Never say never but he needs to manage his workload now that he is the test captain.
@LBC COVID-19 added a large amount of money to the national debt. We owe it to the younger generation to start paying back that debt as soon as possible.
@TheBarmyArmy System.
@MichaelVaughan Does that mean Ireland 🇮🇪 are the world champions ?
@TailendersPod Would like to point out that England 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿 lost two low scoring in Pakistan 🇵🇰 recently.
@englandcricket The weather can only stop England 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿 now .
@bhogleharsha Lot said today re India,s approach early doors compared to England’s . Is it not just the difference between batting first or chasing ?

@thecompdog I am a Hales fan and agree Morgan keep him out the team for too long a time. Hales route back into the team needed some stars to align . 1. Morgan to step down. 2. Baird tow,s injury . 3. Roy’s loss of form . 4 . Butlers fitness pre the World Cup. Happy to see Hales back .
@englandcricket Great performance from England, an all round performance. Hope the weather doesn’t impact the final. Come on England 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿 from England,s Scottish fan.
@TheBarmyArmy It’s all about England,s first six overs and the performance of the Indian spinners. Come on England 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿.
@afneil Sorry to say Biden is too old to run a country and be the leader of the free world . Finish his term then step aside for someone younger .
@TheBarmyArmy I am a CJ fan but would prefer David Willy came in if Wood drops out. CJ is also a great sub fielder.

@bbctms I hope this is false information. Interesting to see if Salt comes in, would they play him behind the stumps, to have Butler closer to the bowlers. Would Salt come in at 3 if the openers stay in more than 10 overs.
@GemHallett You might have a point but did you see France 🇫🇷 play Australia 🇦🇺 yesterday in the men’s game ?

@mufaddal_vohra Morgan,s treatment of Hales was correct but it could have cost the WC when Roy was injured. Re Hales exile I suggest it was too long it shouldn’t have required Morgan’s retirement to bring him back . Onwards and upwards for both Hales and England 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿.
@SkySportsGolf Sandy Lyles bunker shot at the 72 hole at the masters.

@GBNEWS Re nationalisation on one side the costs to the public up front would be controlled at affordable levels but they would pay in other ways. It would also help if they over employed including a large apprenticeship and scholarship program.

@GBNEWS Started in the ESI in 79, it was a holiday camp but we produced electricity. In Scotland the 2 nuc,s became SNL then went bust. We became BE and basically went bust. EDF came in and as part of a bigger group we continued. Question what’s the cost of renationalising?
@englandcricket Well done England all round great performance . That includes the management of the batting order and rotation of the bowlers.
@SkySportsGolf It’s a true statement I am sure . However if LIV golfers don’t have access to ranking points a lot of them will have to go through the qualifying process.
@Dballesteros79 @NCG_com No it’s ok I will take your word.
@Dballesteros79 @NCG_com Thanks . I think you are giving me an opinion. Not a fact or a rule .
@Dballesteros79 @NCG_com Thanks , are you confident. ? What rule is it covered under ?
@NCG_com Serious question, is the player entitled to rake the bunker with a rake or his shoes before the ball re enters the bunker ? Asking for a friend .

@HannahHoldenNCG @NCG_com Yes played the course twice , the last time we mad Scot,s x6 were the only guys on the course in heavy rain, they said the course was open and would not refund our voucher. Re the square green the jury was hung for me lacks character like none . In saying that great course. 17 !!
@BunkeredOnline Your time as a player in the Ryder Cup has past , thanks for everything. You would have joined the captains trail but I think that is now unlikely but never say never .

@englandcricket Not a professional performance by England. Looking at the numbers Stokes under bowled. Maybe Brooks should have slipped down the order , with so much lost in the first innings England should have been watching the DLS. Sorry to see weather impacting the result.
@GolfMonthly No . The method is tried and tested. LIV have known from the start their format was outside that method. LIV needs to change or their players will slide down the rankings.

@SajSadiqCricket Don’t know much about the squad but would suggest that the team selection was wrong. 5 X 4 over bowlers , India used 6 bowlers with one only getting one over . Did Azam have another bowler he could use ?
@jamiecweir Leeds for what they did in the seventies with Don Revie .

@GolfDigest Really tough but as a pro you need to know the rules better , if in doubt involve a rules official. Pro is short for professional, it’s how you are going to make a living. Top class pro,s use the rules to their advantage.
@SkySportsNews Not against this super league, any team should be able to play in their national FA cup plus each country taking part should have promotion and relegation.
@englandcricket Sorry to hear this news, gutted for Reece . The joys / horrors of professional sports.
@LIVGolfLatest Major,s can’t just be created. Many people have suggested that the players be upgraded but it’s never happened.
@TheBarmyArmy Great squad, quite hard to pick the starting eleven. First to miss out, Phil Salt, Harry Brook, Chris Woakes . Reece Topley if injured or Liam Livingstone.
@GBNEWS Rishi Sunak then the first thing he should do is call a general election.
@afneil Sorry to say if this is true , the PM must either go or she should call a general election. The Tory party will not win and a new leader installed while in opposition.
@MyGolfSpy I am not for or against hoodies but I would say wearing a hoody is pointless unless you use the hood. Most golfers wearing a hoody don’t use the hood.
@jamescobb22 @bbctms Agreed but he is not the future.
@bbctms Wish Broad was available, would have taken him instead of Anderson , we learn nothing playing Anderson.
@AlStewartOBE Once in a generation is 16 years in my book. Happy to wait till then before we go round the block again. Stronger together.
@TheBarmyArmy All in correct decision not to appeal. Kept good faith and with Wade remaining gave the bowlers the test they needed cos Wade was the only guy that could win the game for Australia.

@MichaelBreed The tours should exist together, there is a problem with Saudi money but that said should Man City and NUFC be treated the same ? Secondly re order of merit points the criteria is set , if LIV does not conform then no points and access to majors will be a problem from LIV .
@TheBarmyArmy He is great but must continue to keep his fitness level high. First in line to replace Anderson .
@TansuYegen He makes a good point however I would say without your health and happiness you have nothing. 😍
@englandcricket England have lost the last two low scoring thrillers with the bowlers doing there stuff and the top batsmen not doing there bit.
@GolfDigest OWGR body has a pre set rules for awarding ranking points, LIV and their members are aware of the rules. It's up to LIV to make a chase for their comps to be awarded OWGR points.

@paulhutcheon Worked all working life in the electrical supply industry with a single spine pay scale , always believed the same cash offer to each individual would have been better. In these tough times this type of pay offer would help the lower paid.
@buitengebieden Nothing beats a mother's love ( cuddle) . Miss my mum so much. X.
@bbctms Great performance today, deserves an extended run in the team . Re Butler and Bairstow they only play in the test team as batsmen as Bairstow is showing us this summer.

@GolfDigest Clearly I am not inside the ropes but I have long held the opinion that despite the vast rewards available on the PGA tour , the PGA tour players believed that the rewards were not enough. The PGA tours actions seem to show their opinions were correct.
@GolfDigest This tale reminds me of Tigers nine iron during the Ryder Cup in Ireland. It's sleeping with the fishes thanks to Stevie,s butter fingers.
@jamiecweir Agree with you but as you know the FedEx replaced the order of merit which Tiger won hands down before the season was half done.

@paulhutcheon Have always said the best thing an MP & MSP could do was to accept a pay freeze at the first opportunity for the rest of their term of office. Sends a clear message and sets a great standard.
@HPClyburn @ash_simon Sorry to say he showed poor class, a stressful day and few beers doesn't excuse his actions. Well done to his wife and her first major victory. Onwards and upwards.
@ShaunLintern You're dead right, any time I pick up at the airport it's a great watch . The emotions/love is all over the place. Magic.
@EilishMccolgan Well done Eilish brilliant run , can't remember the last time I was shouting at the telly while watching a race .
@BeckettUnite Yes a big difference, the French people will be paying in other ways. In GB the energy companies were all hit by windfall taxes, money to the Exchequer to help in other ways.
@FSB_Voice If it works for both parties then go for it. Even if the the company just gets a happier worker. Work life balance is important.
@NeilMeffan @CampsLyon @D4RNS__ @BylineTV @jonlis1 I am saying once in a generation means every 16 or 18 years. What's your opinion, answer the question.

@CampsLyon @D4RNS__ @BylineTV @jonlis1 The gentleman in the video has a point but I agree with you. Once in a generation is what we were told, I am interested how long this is? In my view once in a generation is equal to 16 or 18 years. Answers on a postcard .

@HankHaney I am not in favour of LIV but I have to say LIV has exposed something in the PGA tour. These increases in prize funds and tweaks to the schedule. Shows us what the players have quietly believed for sometime, despite the fast amount of money in the PGA tour there was a lot more.
@catherinemep Both her majesty,s government and her majesty,s opposition were against Brexit. It was individuals like Boris Johnson and others who told lies and convinced a majority to vote leave .

@GBNEWS We must continue to drive towards net zero, in the electrical supply industry green energy is good but it's not going to be great until we can develop large scale storage systems or backup systems like batteries.
@SunScotNational Everyone is entitled to their opinion. I am too polite but what would Logan Roy say ? Rhymes with duck.
@GolfMonthly LD is a great guy but the captaincy should have went to a European based player, RK, PL or MH. LD could have been part of the captaincy team and taken the main role in two years time .

@GolfDigest The RC has a great history and will continue but it is at a crossroads re Europe mainly they have lost future captains, re USA they have lost the same plus some players.If LIV continues the  RC,s will have big shadows over them,sponsors and SKY TV will help decide the RC future.

@SkySportsGolf The Ryder Cup so far the biggest casualty of LIV and the damage LIV will do to professional golf has not finished. It will be interesting to see when more top golfers move over , what happens to the lower ranked players.
@PGATOUR Well done to CS, that's him lost the tag. No longer the best golfer not to win a major, WZ holds the tag now .

@NoLayingUp The RC & PC are the two biggest casualty's of LIV at the moment. Professional golfers have always first and foremost been in it for themselves. In saying that I feel the rewards from the PGA tour despite being high , some players feel should have been higher .
@SkySportsGolf Nothing, the only suggestion I would offer is Hovland,s performance, if Hovland had contended better in the front nine Rory may had got closer to his basic target of minus 20.
@bbctms Alex Hales. Time to come in from the cold.
@SkySportsGolf LIV players future in the majors depends mainly on the decision weather or not to award ranking points for their events. If not only exempt players have a future in the majors.
@NicolaSturgeon @scotgov Please answer this question, once in a generation, what time does this cover . In my opinion it's 16 years, what's your opinion re this question?

@_PaulMonaghan Scotland mostly had a surplus electricity generation, that has been depleted by the closing of 2 big coal plants and HNB, these being in part replaced by wind farms, we also have an extra inter connector.Having a surplus is good but cos we are away from London we pay a penalty.

@CatharineHoey I rarely vote, I voted in both referendums, re local and general elections I trust the person elected to do the best job they can do. Would be happy to see voting made a legal requirement. Despite all that I am still entitled to my opinion.
@GBNEWS Boris as a person, very poor tried to defend the indefensible, the amount of backtracking just made him look really silly. Liar liar pants on fire.
